bill.title: Mobile Home Park Water Quality
bill.description: Concerning water quality in mobile home parks, and, in connection therewith, making an appropriation.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Transportation, Housing & Local Government
House Committee on Transportation, Housing & Local Government Refer Amended to Finance
House Committee on Finance Refer Unamended to Appropriations
House Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Finance
Senate Committee on Finance Refer Amended to Appropriations
Senate Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee
Senate Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate

votes.desc: House Transportation, Housing & Local Government: Adopt amendment L.001 (Attachment C).
House Finance: Refer House Bill 23-1257 to the Committee on Appropriations.
House Appropriations: Refer House Bill 23-1257, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.
House Transportation, Housing & Local Government: Refer House Bill 23-1257, as amended, to the Committee on Finance.
Senate Finance: Adopt amendment L.023 (Attachment G)
Senate Finance: Adopt amendment L.024 (Attachment H)
Senate Finance: Refer House Bill 23-1257, as amended, to the Committee on Appropriations.
Senate Appropriations: Refer House Bill 23-1257, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.
